TopicTitle: KSP RP forum server CPU usage exceeded.

Articles.Content:
It\'s to register for posting; there\'s nothing to stop people who aren\'t registered from reading the threads, apart from the fact that the forums isn\'t up.

Radion, if you\'re unable to upload the data, could you PM my posts from my nation thread?

> 
> Radion, please, *please* play the gaben 'I hope it was worth the wait' soundclip upon logging in for the first time.

> 
> 
> 
> 
> <iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/L4Ws9JSCwh0?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

That would be hilarious!

> 
> Can we expect to see the site up by the weekend, or will it take longer than that to redo?
Radion, any updates? Not to sound impatient, but I can barely wait for the forum to coem back up ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Between odd files, poor PHP, annoyances with the host, and a severe problem I have in real life, I\'ve just decided to save what I can from the backup. I, like the Dev Team, will not be announcing any release dates for the same reasons as they (albeit on a smaller scale).

> 
> Between odd files, poor PHP, annoyances with the host, and a severe problem I have in real life, I\'ve just decided to save what I can from the backup. I, like the Dev Team, will not be announcing any release dates for the same reasons as they (albeit on a smaller scale).

Erm, Just checking, the map will be saved, right? I don\'t want to have to have to participate in the wild rush for territory again, and I quite like my current territory and don\'t want to be beaten to it...

> 
> Erm, Just checking, the map will be saved, right? I don\'t want to have to have to participate in the wild rush for territory again, and I quite like my current territory and don\'t want to be beaten to it...

> ![img-thing?.out=jpg&size=l&tid=50162609](http://www.polyvore.com/cgi/img-thing?.out=jpg&size=l&tid=50162609)Jk ;D 

But seriously, why not start a new?

> 
> But seriously, why not start a new?

Because some people don\'t want to be beaten to their current territory...

> 
> Because some people don\'t want to be beaten to their current territory...

Yeah, I agree. I love my current territory\'s location, even if it isn\'t as huge as others :3

And I do not want to start ANOTHER flame war over the area I am at. I mean, really. Look at the past:

1. War over land purchase that tips flaming over the edge.

2. Kortugans destroy a nation and take purchase (cry cry) because of flames.

3. New forum, flame over entire nation\'s claim.

TL;DR: preserve the old map.
I\'ll be dropping my nation... I\'m not going to have a huge amount of time (I did before now). Instead I shall start a corp.

> 
> I\'ll be dropping my nation... I\'m not going to have a huge amount of time (I did before now). Instead I shall start a corp.

\*calling shotgun for hosting you\*

I AM A NINJA.

On topic: waiting is not boring!
Any update on how it\'s going? I can\'t wait for this site to be back up ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Any updates Radion?

I\'m sure it\'ll be worth the wait, guys.

...I Hope...

If I had to take a guess at this point, I\'m assuming Radion\'s 'severe problem in real life' has taken priority over getting the site back up, which is obviously a good thing (The priority of real life, not the severe problem). I was looking forward to being able to RP again, though... :\'(
Radion knows i can implement Plan B in an instant. So he probably has plans.

> 
> Radion knows i can implement Plan B in an instant. So he probably has plans.

![confused.jpg](http://www.skial.com/custom/smilies/confused.jpg)Explaaain..

> 
> ![confused.jpg](http://www.skial.com/custom/smilies/confused.jpg)Explaaain..

Basically, Ascensiam takes over the forum and does pretty much what Radion was going to do, while adding a new test of his own etc.

Oh god, a new test.

PLEASE no.

> 
> Oh god, a new test.
> 
> PLEASE no.

That\'s true, but if you passed Radion\'s test, you get a check in advance.

> 
> Basically, Ascensiam takes over the forum and does pretty much what Radion was going to do, while adding a new test of his own etc.

I don\'t take over anything, i simply restructure my own site for my EU3 mod into an RP forum. Half of it by now is simply making boards visible.

> 
> **That\'s true, but if you passed Radion\'s test, you get a check in advance.**
> 
> I don\'t take over anything, i simply restructure my own site for my EU3 mod into an RP forum. Half of it by now is simply making boards visible.

Booger.
( also, what EU3 mod? )

> 
> Booger.
> 
> ( also, what EU3 mod? )

It\'s a work in progress currently halted until the information gathering process is done, but at the moment it looks somewhat like... er, this.

> ![2012-06-01_00001.jpg](http://i461.photobucket.com/albums/qq333/Ascensiam/2012-06-01_00001.jpg)

> 
> It\'s a work in progress currently halted until the information gathering process is done, but at the moment it looks somewhat like... er, this.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> > ![2012-06-01_00001.jpg](http://i461.photobucket.com/albums/qq333/Ascensiam/2012-06-01_00001.jpg)

wut the..
(edit: nvm, I just saw that it\'s kerbin >.> Are you going to delete the human nations and add the RP nations? )

> 
> wut the..
> 
> (edit: nvm, I just saw that it\'s kerbin >.> Are you going to delete the human nations and add the RP nations? )

Yes, that is where i fell short, i am still gathering information and is only about 20% done.
